info.author: Thomas Levine
info.description:
Knurko
======

Watch the video and select a single frame from the video.
You might choose to cut the video in two at this frame.

Run knurko on a video file.

    knurko wrist-cracking.mp4

The video will open in mplayer.
**Press "q" when you reach the frame of interest**.
The video will stop, and the number of the frame that you
have chosen will be printed to stdout.

And since the video is playing in mplayer, you may also use
any of mplayer's interactive controls.

You need to have mplayer installed in order to use knurko.
info.name: knurko
info.summary: Select a frame from a video file.
info.html_description:
Watch the video and select a single frame from the video. You might choose to cut the video in two at this frame.

Run knurko on a video file.

knurko wrist-cracking.mp4

The video will open in mplayer. Press “q” when you reach the frame of interest. The video will stop, and the number of the frame that you have chosen will be printed to stdout.

And since the video is playing in mplayer, you may also use any of mplayer’s interactive controls.

You need to have mplayer installed in order to use knurko.
